web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.description: Custom websites, and web applications built with modern technologies. We create responsive, SEO-optimized solutions that drive business growth.

app_development.title: App Development
app_development.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. We build intuitive, high-performance apps that users love.

api_development.title: API Development & Integrations
api_development.description: Robust RESTful APIs, system integrations, and data pipelines. Connect your applications seamlessly with secure, scalable solutions.

business_automation.title: Business Process Automation
business_automation.description: Streamline your operations with PowerApps, LogicApps, and custom workflow solutions. Reduce manual tasks and increase efficiency.

application_support_maintenance.title: Application Support & Maintenance
application_support_maintenance.description: Comprehensive support and maintenance services to keep your applications running smoothly. Website care plans, ongoing support, managed web services, and system administration.
